pages.text: Invoking the strength of a monsoon, rain falls continuously for the duration of the ritual.$(br2)$(warning) Rain cannot be disabled for the duration of the ritual.$(br2)Additionally, lightning will strike within the ritual area, although all fires that are started and all creatures on fire will be extinguished.
$(standing_stones) As a $(l:rituals/tiers)$(bold)tier II$() ritual, $(l:rituals/ritual_heavy_storms#multiblock)a standing stone and a runed pillar are required$(). Please see later pages.
A $(l:rituals/standing_stone)dark oak pillar and standing stone$() of runestone or runed obsidian are required.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Duration:$() The ritual lasts $(ritual:heavy_storms/SECONDS/duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Size:$() The ritual will search for within an area of $(ritual:heavy_storms/radius_x) and $(ritual:heavy_storms/radius_z) blocks horizontally, and by $(ritual:heavy_storms/radius_y) blocks vertically.$(br2)$(bold)Lightning$(): Lightning has a $(ritual:heavy_storms/PERCENT/lightning_chance) chance per tick of striking.
$(bold)Lightning Frequency$(): Lightning will strike a total of $(ritual:heavy_storms/lightning_interval) times (with -1 denoting an infinite number of times), per ritual execution.
